stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, name asset, ice, operation or upgrade, then reveal 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash each revealed card that has the named type, then gain 4 credits for each card trashed this way.
text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, name asset, ice, operation or upgrade, then reveal 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash each revealed card that has the named type, then gain 4[credit] for each card trashed this way.
title: Embezzle
